attributes.action: Stop the use of dog skin in imported garments to the UK. State animal of origin on all UK leather goods
attributes.additional_details:
Due to the import of items made from the brutal killing of dogs in China this is a petition to have all leather and fur items sold in this country to have the animal origin on them. Item should state if it's lambskin, calfskin, cow leather etc to stop trade with the perpetrators of this brutal act!
http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-2977448/Joaquin-Phoenix-speaks-China-s-horrific-dog-leather-trade.html?ito=social-facebook
